alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Chariton; Linn; Livingston (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 6:09PM CDT until June 06 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Chariton County in north central Missouri... Southwestern Linn County in north central Missouri... Northeastern Carroll County in north central Missouri... Southeastern Livingston County in north central Missouri... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 609 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hale, or 12 miles southeast of Chillicothe, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Brunswick, Hale, Mendon, Sumner, Rothville, Triplett and Avalon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
